author: Simon Difford
description: Zingy, sweet and sour, fruity and bourbon-laced. The sugar syrup is my own addition and depending on your lemons and tastes you may want to either omit or increase to 5ml (1/6oz).
name: Man O' War
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
